text: Palicourea candida is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. ==Sources== * Jaramillo, T., Cornejo, X. & Pitman, N. 2004. Palicourea candida. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Palicourea candida
